info.label: Software Engineer
info.brief: I love solving problems with well-architected and well-tested software. I'm a firm believer in test driven development as well as paired programming.

history.summary: As a software engineer, I was responsible for
highlights: Increased profits on left-handed spin widgets by 35%.
Promoted to Head Ninja after 500 successful cage matches.
